comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Demiana:

text.language: }a~lou n~cab/ m~paryenoc: ]cwtp n~kuria m~m/i: ]selet n~te P,#c#: ]a~gia m~m/i Dumian/.
The wise celibate child, the chosen and true lady, the bride of Christ, Saint Demiana.

language.div: Anak perawan yang bijaksana, wanita terpilihan yang sejati, mempelai Kristus, St. Demiana.

text.language: الصبية العذراء الحكيمة المختارة البارة عروس المسيح القديسة دميانه.
Yai icjen tecmeta~lou: nacmeh e~bol qen ]covia: acmoc] n~nikocmikon: acmenre n~]paryenia.
This is she who was filled with wisdom, from her childhood, she hated the earthly, and she loved virginity.

div.div: Dialah yang dipenuhi hikmat sejak masa kecilnya. Ia membenci dunia fana, dan mencintai keperawanan.

text.language: هذه التي امتلأت من الحكمة منذ صباها فأبغضت العالميات وأحبت البتولية.
Acswpi n~]ar,/: n~lum/n n~te pioujai: y~mau n~hme m~paryenoc: qen pipurgoc e~ta peciwt kotf.
She became the head, and a harbor of salvation, the mother of forty virgins, in the tower which her father built.

language.div: Ia menjadi pemimpin dan pelabuhan keselamatan, ibu dari empat puluh perawan, di menara yang dibangun oleh ayahnya.

text.language: صارت رئيسة وميناء للخلاص وأما للأربعين عذراء في القصر الذي بناه لها أبوها.
Afjwl e~bol m~P,#c#: actacyo m~mof n~je tefseri: e~tacmere m~mof n~je Dumian/: af[i n~]metmarturia.
When he denied Christ, his loving daughter Demiana, restored his faith, and he received martyrdom.

language.div: Saat ayahnya menyangkal Kristus, putrinya, Demiana, penuh kasih, pulihkan imannya, ayahnya pun terima kemartiran.

text.language: ولما كفر بالمسيح ردته ابنته دميانه التي أحبته فنال الشهادة.
Eybe vai afouwrp n~je p~ouro: afouahcahni qen necqici: acsepm~kah n~oum/s n~cop: ac[i n~]metmarturia.
Therefore the King sent for her, and ordered her to be tortured, she endured repeated sufferings, and received martyrdom.

language.div: Lalu raja mengutus orang dan perintahkan siksaan berat. Ia menanggung penderitaan berulang kali, dan terima kemartiran.

text.language: من أجل هذا أرسل الملك أمره بتعذيبها فقبلت آلامات عديدة ونالت الشهادة.
Pih~me e#y#u# m~paryenoc: e~nauswpi nemac qen pipurgoc: au[i n~]metmarturia: qen pie~hoou n~ouwt nemac.
The forty holy virgins, who were with her in the tower, received martyrdom, all in one day with her.

language.div: Keempat puluh perawan kudus, yang bersamanya di menara, terima kemartiran, semuanya dalam satu hari bersamaan.

text.language: والأربعون عذراء الذين كانوا معها في القصر نلن الشهادة معها في يوم واحد.
